Sony KD-49X7500H 49" Slim 4K Ultra HD Smart Android LED TV

Sony KD-49X7500H HD Smart Android LED TV comes with 49" Slim 4K Ultra HD Smart Android LED TV. It's Display is designed with Size 123 CM (49 inch), Screen Type LED, Resolution 3840 x 2160 Pixels. This new TV has some smart features, these are -Android, Youtube, Netflix and Google Play Store, Google Assistant. This TV is featured with 16 GB Inbuilt Memory, 10 W + 10 W Speaker, DTS Digital Surround (Dolby Audio (Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus)), AC 100–240 V, 50/60 Hz Power Requirements/Voltage and 100W Power Consumption. Here, HDMI 3 (2 Side, 1 Rear), USB 2 (Side), Wi-Fi 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, Ethernet (LAN) 1(Side), AV, Headphone, Antenna/Cable Inpu and Bluetooth connectivity are also available. This TV has no parts warranty.

description:
• Model: Sony W660G
  • Backlight Type Direct LED
  • Resolution: 1920x1080
  • Audio Power Output 5W + 5W

Our Sony Bravia W660G 50 inch LED Smart TV has High Dynamic Range (HDR), so detail lost in the darkest and brightest areas of a picture are preserved, giving a much more dynamic look.You will witness clips being ultra fast on this Sony LED TV with YouTube including a YouTube button on the remote control for easy browsing. This also keep cables neatly hidden in the stand and held in place with the supplied cable holder.

Sony Bravia 75X8000H

Our powerful processor uses advanced algorithms to cut noise and boost detail. With an even clearer 4K signal, everything you watch is closer to4Kresolution, full of life-like color and contrast.

Super-resolution, whatever you’re watching

See glorious 4K pictures, rich with real-world detail and texture, exclusively powered by our 4K HDRprocessorX1™. Images filmed in 2K and even Full HD is upscaled close to 4K resolution by 4K X-Reality™ PRO using a unique 4K database.

Reproduces a wider, more precise range of colors

By widening the color spectrum, TRILUMINOS powered by our X1 processors reproduces more colors than conventional television. It analyses and processes data in every image to make colors even more natural and precise so pictures are closer than ever to real life

Sound flows around you with Dolby Atmos

Surround yourself with sound and step right inside the scene. With Dolby Atmos, sound comes from above as well as from the sides so you can hear objects moving overhead with more realism for a truly multi-dimensional experience.

Sony Bravia 75X8000H

Over 5000 apps, more than any other smart TV

Sony’s Smart Android TV has an unbeatable number of apps. Choose the ones that make your life more fun and entertaining

Sony Bravia 75X8000H

Our powerful processor uses advanced algorithms to cut noise and boost detail. With an even clearer 4K signal, everything you watch is closer to4Kresolution, full of life-like color and contrast.

Super-resolution, whatever you’re watching

See glorious 4K pictures, rich with real-world detail and texture, exclusively powered by our 4K HDRprocessorX1™. Images filmed in 2K and even Full HD is upscaled close to 4K resolution by 4K X-Reality™ PRO using a unique 4K database.

Reproduces a wider, more precise range of colors

By widening the color spectrum, TRILUMINOS powered by our X1 processors reproduces more colors than conventional television. It analyses and processes data in every image to make colors even more natural and precise so pictures are closer than ever to real life

Sound flows around you with Dolby Atmos

Surround yourself with sound and step right inside the scene. With Dolby Atmos, sound comes from above as well as from the sides so you can hear objects moving overhead with more realism for a truly multi-dimensional experience.

Sony Bravia 75X8000H

Over 5000 apps, more than any other smart TV

Sony’s Smart Android TV has an unbeatable number of apps. Choose the ones that make your life more fun and entertaining
